entities.name: habit
entities.description: Habit is mentioned as something that didn't work anymore and was stuffed into Harry's pocket.

entities.name: niffler
entities.description: Nifflers are magical creatures that were used in the Care of Magical Creatures class. They have a long snout and can sniff enthusiastically.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a teacher who was looking down into the crate to see if there was a spare niffler.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione had to go to the hospital wing and was missing from the class.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who released a niffler and it filled his lap with coins.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson was listening to the conversation between Harry, Ron, and Hagrid.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who had a niffler in his pocket and was muttering something about explaining later.

relationships.description: Ron released the niffler, which then filled his lap with coins.
Hagrid was looking down into the crate to see if there was a spare niffler.
Hermione had to go to the hospital wing.
Harry stuffed his habit into his pocket.
